data.message: That's sad because My dad need a kidney we were just lucky my brother donated his kidney thank God we just were lucky we had a family member who donated but the bad thing was my dad had to pay a lot of money for that kidney I don't think that is fair my brother gave him his kidneyand he had to pay alot out of his pocket for it I don't understand why the government has to change or the middle class is going to end up broke!!! :(
